key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party manufacturers

controversies: Potential violations of U.S. export control and economic sanctions laws

governance_issues: Ethical concerns and investigations into potential securities law violations
Allegations of unethical business practices and stock price manipulation

sources.title: Silicon Labs and MaxLinear Settle Infringement Lawsuits
sources.snippet: AUSTIN, Texas & CARLSBAD, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Silicon Labs (NASDAQ: SLAB) and MaxLinear Inc. (NYSE: MXL) today announced a satisfactory settlement of all litigation between the two companies. MaxLinear has granted Silicon Labs a license to its substantial patent portfolio for the accused Silicon Labs products.
